about.title: About
about.p1: I am passionate about learning and implementing new technologies. I always strive to be methodical and systematic when approaching projects in an organized and efficient manner. Moreover, when the situation demands it, I seek to think outside the box and find innovative solutions. As a dedicated and responsible individual, I am driven by a constant pursuit of self-improvement and continuous growth, paying attention to detail and quality.
about.p2: I am self-taught and proactive, with strong interpersonal skills, enabling effective teamwork. I enjoy discussing ideas and finding solutions to problems, and I am always eager to take on new challenges with a great willingness to learn and grow from each experience. Currently, my goal is to immerse myself in web and mobile development, shaping my profile as a FrontEnd developer and working towards becoming a Full Stack developer
